SELECT * FROM VISITS
WHERE TO_CHAR(visit_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
WHERE TO_CHAR(visit_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
WHERE TO_CHAR(visit_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') > TO_CHAR(sysdate-7, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_CHAR(visit_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') < = TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
WHERE TO_CHAR(visit_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') > TO_CHAR(sysdate-30, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_CHAR(visit_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') < = TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
ORDER BY visit_date ASC
